events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your resume and get back to you soon.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Congratulations, you have passed the initial screening. We would like to schedule a technical interview to further assess your engineering skills.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 2pm UTC with our lead developer. Please confirm your availability.
The technical interview was completed successfully. Our panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
We have scheduled an HR interview for April 23rd at 11am UTC to discuss company culture and employment terms. Please prepare accordingly.
Your HR interview went well, and the team is excited about your potential fit with our company values and work environment.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the software engineer position. Please review the offer letter and let us know if you have any questions.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer. We appreciate your enthusiasm to join our engineering team.
We have received your acceptance of the job offer. Welcome aboard! We will begin the onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding process has officially started. You will receive all necessary materials and access credentials to begin your new role.
The hiring process is now complete. We are excited to have you join our engineering team and look forward to your contributions.
